projectsgrid.emptytags: There are no project with that tag

searchBar.placeholder: Keyword of the project you are interested in

hero.title: Powering tech talent
hero.subtitle: We provide a powerful and easy to use platform to simply the process of talent search connecting teams, skills, companies and candidates
hero.beta: Beta is on its way and big things are coming
hero.step5Title: 5. Get top employment offers or advance
hero.step1subtitle: It doesn't matter if you have experience, a diploma, or not, just choose what you like. Some of the most popular are: data science, UX / UI designer, copywritter, among many others
hero.step2subtitle: Do you have experience? Great! Here choose the level according to your ability, this will define the league where you will participate: Student, Junior, Senior or Top
hero.step3subtitle: We present the weekly challenge, the objectives, rules and details that you need to know and, now you can start creating!
hero.step4subtitle: Create and improve to get to the top 100 to start having company visualization and employment offers.
hero.step5subtitle: Accept the offer from a company or go to the next level.

login.title: Hey!
login.errorDescription: It is possible that either your email or password were not correct.

register.title: Create your account
register.errorDescription: It is possible that either your email or password were not correct.

editable.name: Name
editable.picContext: To update your profile picture just paste the link from the your favourite social media picture
editable.urlContext: Here you can change your personal url. This part will go at the end of pporfol.io/. Be aware that once you cange it, the old one will be deleted
editable.majorDescr: Aerospace, industrial, arquitechture, biotech,computer science, developer, etc

editProject.title: Edit
editProject.contentText: You're about to edit this project. Once you save it, you can't go back
editProject.tagPlaceHolder: Add up to 3 skills to this project

premium.title: We are currently working to have the best services ready and the final touches are missing so you can get the most out of your portfolio with your premium account. If you have questions or would like to know more about the current situation of the project, please fill out the form in the contact area.
premium.description: In order to be able to see the analaytics of your projects, account, customize styles, colors, improve positioning and much more, you must have a premium subscription. If you want to go to premium you can do it right now, it will take only 5 '.

addproject.dialogContent: To create a new project you just have to choose the type of image you want to see, add the title, the link where you have your saved project and description.
addproject.recomendation2: to give colour to your projects. You can find amazing free pictures

tutorial.contextURL: Here you can customize how you want your public url to look. Before changing it, keep in mind that the initial you defined will be free.
tutorial.case1: In the side panel you will find a tab that takes you to the configuration of your profile there you can edit all your personal data.
tutorial.case2: On any of the screens you will see a button at the bottom right that allows you to create projects. Clicking on add project will open a popup with all the instructions. To see the projects, delete them or edit them you just have to go to your projects panel (dashboard) which you can access using the sidebar.
tutorial.finishInfo: Everyhing done! Enjoy your creating your Pportfolio!

cookies.text1: Use of cookies: We use our own and third party cookies
cookies.text2: to improve our services by analyzing your navigation
cookies.text3: habits. If you go on surfing, we will consider you're accepting its use.

policy.checkboxText: I have read and accept the privacy policies
policy.notChecked: In order to create an account you must first accept the terms and conditions of use.
